link_name.description: Property.  The CollisionObject will be attached with a fixed joint to this link

object.description: Property. This contains the actual shapes and poses for the CollisionObject to be attached to the link If action is remove and no object.id is set, all objects attached to the link indicated by link_name will be removed

detach_posture.description: Property.  If certain links were placed in a particular posture for this object to remain attached  (e.g., an end effector closing around an object), the posture necessary for releasing  the object is stored here

weight.description: Property.  The weight of the attached object, if known
